title: WTB: Paying GENEROUSLY for T206 Bill Bernhard SGC50 or better
author: pgellis

posts.post_title: WTB: Paying GENEROUSLY for T206 Bill Bernhard SGC50 or better
posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase a T206 Bill Bernhard in SGC50 or better (NO PSA Please).  I am quite motivated to make a purchase for Bernhard and am willing to pay generously for such a card.  Centering is rather important to me, but could care less about the back.

Please let me know what you have and your asking price.

Thanks for your consideration,
Phil

5 Week Bump.

Any Bernhard SGC50 (or better) out there for sale?

Anyone with a Bill Bernhard in SGC50 or better (NO PSA Please)?  Do you need some extra Christmas cash?  Very motivated to purchase one soon.

Thanks for looking......
Phil
